description: 5 clusters of 10 notes each, internally heavily cross-linked. Tests over-connection detection, suggestion restraint, and precision under high density.

notes.title: Data Lake
notes.content:
# Data Lake

Data Lake is a key frontend practice.
It integrates with [[Stream Processing]], [[Performance Tuning]], [[Zero Trust]].

## Details
Works alongside [[Blue-Green Deploy]].

The agile methodology team follows this pattern closely.
See also: SOLID Principles.
